document_data.mainbody:
jloon was a shade who served the Night Guard of the Prince of Shade Yder Tanthul, for a brief period as his second-in-command, during the late 15 century DR.
He had a square jaw,
Ajloon could not be easily intimidated, even by those the more powerful of shades of Thultanthar. While he lacked some insight, he would readily learn from his experiences and those who offered him advice.
While Yder could often be short with Ajloon,
Ajloon was among the shades that followed Yder in pursuit of the Eye of Gruumsh during the month of Uktar in the .
